meanings.sent1: The blue car is sonsier than the red one.
meanings.sent2: She is the sonsier of the two sisters.
meanings.sent3: The sonsier puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The sonsier clouds floated lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sonsier flowers stood out in the garden.

meanings.sent1: This is the sonsier cake I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: He is the sonsier player on the team.
meanings.sent3: The sonsier cat chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The sonsier stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The sonsier mountain peak towered above the rest.
